TEXT.TITLE: ELECTRONIC CONTROL <ECSIU> INITIAL OFFER STARTS
TEXT.BODY: Electronic Control Security Inc said an initial public offering of 1,250,000 units is under way at 1.60 dlrs each through underwriters led by Jersey Capital Markets Group Inc. Reuter
